title: Study in mice examines impact of reused cooking oil on breast cancer progression

title_detail.value: Study in mice examines impact of reused cooking oil on breast cancer progression

summary: Compounds in thermally abused cooking oils may trigger genetic, biochemical changes that hasten the progression of late-stage breast cancer, promoting tumor cells' growth and proliferation.

summary_detail.value: Compounds in thermally abused cooking oils may trigger genetic, biochemical changes that hasten the progression of late-stage breast cancer, promoting tumor cells' growth and proliferation.
